title: TikTok Paid for Influencers to Attend the Pro-TikTok Rally in DC
description: The embattled social media company brought out the checkbook to ensure at least 30 of its biggest assets—creators—were in DC to help fend off critics.

title: For Smarter Robots, Just Add Humans
description: Autonomous machines are still too clumsy for delicate tasks. But humans can operate mechanical arms from afar, turning physical labor into remote work.

title: If the US Bans TikTok, WeChat Might Be Next
description: WeChat has 19 million users in the US and is a lifeline for people across the Chinese diaspora.
